activities: We receive personal information from our personnel as Altran personnel are mobile and work through the various Altran affiliates throughout the world. In addition, since we are a global company, we may receive customer personal information from customers located in the European Union, including Switzerland.

personaldata: The personal data covered includes personnal information for recruitment and employment and the personal information we receive from our customers on occassion.
recoursemech: We will attempt to resolve disputes internally and if such disputes cannot be resolved internally, they will be referred to the American Arbitration Association. EU DPA's & Swiss FDPIC for organizational human resources data.
